events.description: List of start and stop events for this problem, which can occur multiple times.

codeset.description: Codeset for this code (ICD9 or ICD10)

code.description: Actual ICD code for this diagnosis

eventtype.description: The type of this event: START, END, HIDDEN, REACTIVATED, or ENCOUNTER

source.description: The source of this event: ENCOUNTER or HISTORY

status.description: The status of this problem event: CHRONIC or ACUTE

onsetdate.description: The specified onset date for this problem, as entered by the practice. If available this is more accurate than the start date.

startdate.description: The date this problem event started or was restarted. Uses the onsetdate if available, otherwise uses the date the problem was entered into the system.

enddate.description: The date this problem event ended or was hidden

encounterdate.description: The date of the encounter where a diagnosis matching this problem was used.

laterality.description: The laterality of this problem. Can be null, LEFT, RIGHT, or BILATERAL.

note.description: The note attached to this event.

createddate.description: The date that the user entered this problem.

createdby.description: The name of the user who entered this problem.

deactivateduser.description: The name of the user who deactivated the problem.

bestmatchicd10code.description: If this was added from the chart or from an encounter without a selected ICD10 code, and if the primary codeset is SNOMED,  then this contains the best matching ICD10 code mapped. Because SNOMED to ICD10 is a many to many map, this will tend to give  the most generic diagnosis.

lastmodifieddatetime.description: The date the problem was last modified. Currently only date precision.

lastmodifiedby.description: The username of the user who last modified this problem.
